title: Game Character Wizard Sound Effects
description: Fight the forces of evil and call upon arcane magic with a heroic protector of your fantasy world! Introducing ESM’s new voice sound library “Game Character Wizard”.
longDescription:
Audio Demos

Video Demos

This sound collection features an ancient male game character hero facing immeasurable odds. He’s a conduit of nature, wields a legendary staff, has magical abilities and enjoys saving the day!

Game Character Wizard provides you with over 380+ immersive, game ready voice over sound files, vocalizations, battle cries, dialogue lines and everything you need to create compelling cinematic scenes, outstanding game experiences and more. The Wizard’s voice texture is bold, well rounded and has a rich audio definition which makes it perfect as is and for further editing.

All of the recordings are delivered in 44.1k 16Bit .wav file format, giving you the best quality for heavy sound editing, pitch shifting, and fx processing while keeping a top notch level of clarity and precision. 

Purge your enemies with fire, ask your allies for aid, and inspire humanity to rise again when darkness falls! Game Character Wizard is not only packed with high quality recordings but includes thought out, cohesive scripted dialogue and vocalizations that will help you build believable fantasy stories, game trailers, in-game character moments and so much more. The time is now, rise to the call with Game Character Wizard. Available now!
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 384 fantasy character voice over audio files
  • 197.4 MB of vocal samples
  • All in 44.1k 16Bit .wav
  • Game Character Voice Over Sound Effects Library
  • Perfect for fantasy games, film and trailers
  • 13 battle cries and sayings
  • 5 breathing types - exhausted, running, frantic, quiet
  • 16 coughing recordings - sickly, wheezy, deep, short, throat
  • 12 sad cries - short, explosive, pitiful, brokenhearted, sniffling, wailing
  • 108 immersive custom dialogue lines like by fire be purged, I am a servant of the sacred fire
  • 40 fight vocals - big, growl, swing, throw, groan, grunt, quick, painful
  • 25 jumping vocalizations - big, single, double jump, windup, painful
  • 21 Laughing voice files - chuckle, evil, confident, hearty, short, hilarious
  • 37 pain vocals - dying, wounded, hurt, and sayings
  • 107 stock dialogue lines like alright, affirmative, attack, no

Number of Audio Waves: 384

Number of Audio Cues: 384

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided:

Supported Development Platforms: Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox One, Oculus, SteamVR / HTC Vive, Gear VR, Linux, HTML5

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox One, Oculus, SteamVR / HTC Vive, Gear VR, Linux, HTML5

Documentation: Content List

Important/Additional Notes:
